item.title: Seminar #3 - Abhinav Jangda - CoCoNet (ASPLOS'22)
item.description:
• Join Session!

Speaker Bio

Abhinav Jangda is a PhD student at the University of Massachusetts Amherst and will join Microsoft Research in Fall 2022. His research focuses on developing programming language abstractions and compilation techniques to help programmers leverage large scale systems efficiently. His work was invited for an article in USENIX :login;, has received an ACM SIGPLAN Distinguished Paper Award at OOPSLA, and a Best Paper Award at PACT.

item.title: Seminar #1 - Davis Blalock - MADDNESS (PMLR'21)
item.description:
• Join Session!

Speaker Bio

Davis Blalock is a research scientist at MosaicML. He completed his PhD at MIT, advised by Professor John Guttag. His primary work is designing efficient machine learning algorithms. He received his M.S. from MIT and his B.S. from the University of Virginia. He is a Qualcomm Innovation Fellow, NSF Graduate Research Fellow, and Barry M. Goldwater Scholar.
